title: BSOD While Patching LoL
body: When i try to update league it gets to about maybe 40% or so and my computer goes into blue screen of death, trying to find a way to fix this without uninstalling and reinstalling the game as ive had this problem on patches before and it only helps short term, please help

replies.body:
Hmmm that's definitely not good. If you're getting a blue screen that would most likely mean some kind of critical failure with your OS. I'd first recommend running a system file check to make sure all of your system files are still working properly, and after that I would go ahead and reinstall your graphics drivers as well. 

Give those a shot and if you're still getting these blue screens please reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can walk you through some additional steps.
